price: E dizem: "Que se faça descer sobre ele um sinal de seu Senhor!" Então, dize: "O Invisível é, apenas, de Allah; esperai, pois; por certo, serei convosco, entre os que esperam"
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦۖ فَقُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡغَيۡبُ لِلَّهِ فَٱنتَظِرُوٓاْ إِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُنتَظِرِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna lawlā unzila ʿalayhi āyatun min rabbihi faqul innamā al-ghaybu lillahi fa-intaẓirū innī maʿakum mina al-muntaẓirīna
